mapper.select: SELECT ZB.ZIP_ID, ZB.ZIP_PET_CATEGORY, ZB.ZIP_TITLE, ZB.ZIP_CONTENT, ZB.ZIP_UPDATE_AT, U.USERS_ID, U.NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZIP_ANSWER ZA WHERE ZA.ZIP_ID = ZB.ZIP_ID) AS ANSWER_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZIP_LIKE ZL WHERE ZL.ZIP_ID = ZB.ZIP_ID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM ZIP_BOARD ZB JOIN USERS U ON ZB.USERS_ID = U.USERS_ID ORDER BY ZIP_ID DESC
